## IImageBitmapRenderingContext.transferFromImageBitmap() method

Replace the contents of the canvas with the contents of an image bitmap.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transferFromImageBitmap(bitmap: IImageBitmap): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bitmap | <code>IImageBitmap</code> | The bitmap to replace the canvas contents with. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
